text: Ej Muhammad, az ʙani Isroil ʙipurs, ki kasone, ki ʙa sui tu sarkasi mekunand, ci nisonahoi ravsane dar kitoʙhojason ʙa onho dodem, ki onhoro ʙa sui haq rohnamoi mekunad pas ʙa tamomi onho kofir sudand va az on ruj toftand va ojoti Uro taƣjir dodand. Har kas, ki ne'matero, ki Alloh ʙa u ato kardaast, digargun sozad, ʙidonad, ki uquʙati U saxt ast
